Body:
Hi I am new to C++ development and to IOT as well.

So I have a project to work on ESP8266 for which i am using VSCode. Now i have installed Arduino extension on VSCode and it is working fine but now i want to use esp-open-sdk to add more features. But the build process is very complicated and is not working for me i am not being able to build the code.

The error that VSCode is giving is that it is not being able to find the imports

import â€œESP8266.hâ€?

Although i cloned the library and added it to include search path in the c++ extension.

So my question is is there a way to either compile the cloned library into a usable sdk that i could import in VSCode?

Or is there some other way i could import the library and include it in my program.

"
